#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define N 5000001
#define ll long long int
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
template<class T>
void scan(T &x)
{
    register T c = gc();
    x = 0;
    T neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,flag;
    ll s,e;
    scan(t);
    while(t--)
    {
    	flag=0;
    	scan(s);
    	scan(e);
    	scan(n);
    	ll x,y;
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    	{
    		scan(x);
    		scan(y);
    		if((x>s && x<e )|| (y>s && y<e))
    		{
    			flag=1;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		{
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		}
    	
    	
    }
}
